title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: The All Types dialog displays obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes named 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes mentioned (i.e., 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') are prominently visible in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
Suggestions:

a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Filter out obfuscated classes completely. I suggest implementing option 'a'.
